title: Tier List Reviewer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check the tier of someone's role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will receive the tier that your target's role is ranked in the tier list pinned in <#972887492359508048>.
- If your target is not ranked on the tier list, you will instead perform a Sheriff (984) check on them.
